item.title: Easy Two-Ingredient Chocolate Muffins for Sweet Tooth
item.description: These two-ingredient chocolate muffins are moist, rich, and incredibly easy to make. Perfect for a quick sweet treat that satisfies your cravings without the hassle.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 12

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups chocolate chips
  • 1 cup unsweetened applesauce

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C) and line a muffin tin with paper liners.
  2. In a mixing bowl, combine the chocolate chips and applesauce until smooth.
  3. Spoon the batter into the prepared muffin tin, filling each liner about 2/3 full.
  4. Bake for 15 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  5. Let the muffins cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack.
